content: happy crocheting find more this pattern along with many other designs can be found here on ravelry and the blog at www jenhayescreations com copyright this pattern and its photos are copyright of jennifer hayes jen hayes creations and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not copy sell republish distribute or translate this pattern and its images in part or whole you are welcome to sell any finished items produced from this pattern please credit jen hayes creations as the designer and include a link to the pattern listing if selling the finished piece online thank you share your work follow along on instagram at @jenhayescreations tag @jenhayescreations and use the hashtag #jenhayescreations to show off your creations and of course link your projects to the design here on ravelry i m so excited to see what you ll create follow along with me blog www jenhayescreations com pinterest www pinterest com/jenhayescreations/ instagram www instagram com/jenhayescreations/ facebook www facebook com/jenhayescreations/ youtube www youtube com/channel/ucsr0-u7fctl8ytxisrblgdw
